definition: report of success/report of a victory
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
variant of 捷[jie2]/quick/nimble
victory/triumph/quick/nimble/prompt
to announce/to inform/report/newspaper/recompense/revenge/CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]
victory reports pour in (idiom); news of success in an endless stream

sentences.english: We found the poster on a partition door in the Villa of the East Garden.
sentences.chinese: 在东园别墅的一道隔扇门上，我们找到了那张捷报。

sentences.english: LATELY, pleasant surprises about European economies have been popping up with happy regularity.
sentences.chinese: 近来，关于欧洲经济的捷报频传。

sentences.english: Around the world, success is spreading rapidly, and hope, which breeds further success, quickly follows.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地捷报频传，新的希望正孕育着进一步的成功。

definition: report a success/announce a victory
victory reports pour in (idiom); news of success in an endless stream
announcement of joyful news/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to win/to be victorious/to report a victory
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to request recognition for sb's merits/to recommend sb for promotion or an award
to withdraw troops from the front/to return in triumph
to announce good news/to report success
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes
secret report
to spur the horse to full speed (idiom)/to go as fast as possible
to seize total victory (idiom); an overwhelming victory/to win by a landslide (in election)
to serve the king diligently/to save the country in times of danger/to send troops to rescue the king
to return in triumph/to return victorious
military situation/military intelligence
elated and excited (idiom); overjoyed
